featured.text: Future bank robbers will not need explosives to blow open bank safes—all they will need is someone who can break computer codes.

definition.zh_def: 能夠迅速釋放大量能量並產生爆炸的物質或裝置。
definition.en_def: A substance or device that can release a large amount of energy rapidly and cause an explosion.
definition.example: The scientists handled the explosive materials with extreme caution.
